WRITING.TEXT: No you shouldn't be eligible for a refund. This is the risk you take with airbnb. If you want hotel accommodations get a hotel. You found three cockroaches so friggin what. I had an ant problem at my house for about a month, we live in a world with bugs, deal with it.
